sql.item: select to_char(t.start_time, 'dd"日"hh24"时"') start_time, t.user_2g, t.user_3g, t.user_4g, t.netuser_2g, t.netuser_3g, t.netuser_4g from EMG_USERS t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_USERS a where a.region_id = ${region_id})

select t.start_time, t.effect_jk_usernum, t.jk_interrupt_usernum from EMG_JK_USERS t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_JK_USERS a where a.region_id = ${region_id})
